resources.string: In order to scan QR codes, you must grant permission to use camera. While Scanning make sure the QR code is at least three inches away from the camera sensor inside a well lit environment.

Prototype Lab Flow is brought to you by the awesome development team of V/X Estate LLC. We are a trio of third-year Computer Engineering students who strive to make everyones lives easier and convenient through the use of this application. Hope you had a wonderful experience. Happy Holidays!

Best Regards
Kenneth
Sukhdeep
Matheus
